Speaker: Speakers/1
Headline: Carrot Fraud: A Real Industry Problem
Description: In this moving talk, Carmichael McFluffkins provides real data and analytics regarding the ongoing carrot fraud epidemic. He even has a hoppin' tune to go with his talk.

Speaker: Speakers/2
Headline: Bat Dudes: Echo Location and Criminal Justice
Description: Bruce outlines his 5 step process on becoming a vigilante and staying rich. Warning: features screeching.

Headline: Big Data: Barking Up the Wrong Tree
Description: Dr. Terry Woofums, a professor emeritus at the University of Barkley wows the audience in this talk about how researchers followed the wrong data sets to arrive at some surprising conclusions

Headline: Arf: Arf Arf Arf
Description: ARF ARF ARF ARF ARF! Arf. Arf. Arf. ARF! ARF ARF!

Headline: 7 Inspirational Ways to Promote Healthy Mud Puddling
Description: Do you have family members who mud puddle like filthy humans? You aren't alone! Janet's 7 inspirational ideas will make sure you and your hoard are staying healthy while enjoying just the right amount of mud.

Speaker: Speakers/6
Headline: Such Talk, Very Wow
Description: Very much talk, so many talk. Also puppies, puppers, and doggos. You will be rating this talk 14/10. Everyone says would go again.

Headline: Art, Art, Art!
Description: Seally Dan talks about the influence of seals in modern art, and their contributions to the performing community.

Speaker: Speakers/8
Headline: Hacking the Safari: Securing Your Watering Hole
Description: Safarinet security extraordinaire Rob Rhinor shares his expert tips to keep those pesky predators from ruining your precious days at the local watering hole

Headline: Music of the Night: Ribbits in the Dark
Description: Concert pianist Alex Grenoille explains the motivation behind her acclaimed Ribbits in the Dark musical

Headline: Yarn in the New Age
Description: Kitty gives a fascinating rundown of the history of yarn-based toys and how they've evolved over the years

Speaker: Speakers/11
Headline: You're It: Origins of Grey Duck
Description: Duck duck grey... duck or goose? Depends where you live! Dr. Swann gives a definitive answer but we won't spoil it--you might be surprised at the real origins.

Speaker: Speakers/12
Headline: 20,000 Leagues Under the Pond
Description: The amazing world of pond scum has the light shone on it through the moving spoken word poetry by Duck Norris

Speaker: Speakers/13
Headline: Tuskany: The Sharing Economy
Description: The popular Safarinet app Tuskany has proven the animal kingdom has a ton to give but at what cost? Al Boar paints a grim portent of what's in the store for our futures.

Headline: Chasing the American Dream Car
Description: When Terry's father was growing up, Ford was the brand no one could touch--every dog wanted to bite into one. But today the landscape is changing and car bumpers aren't what they used to be
